UPDATE: I found a fix for the ubisoft error!

If you are using AVG then go to advanced settings->directory excludes. Then add a path for C:\ProgramFiles\Ubisoft.

Okay...I fixed the Ubisoft Game Launcher:
Error Code 2
The problem is when you unpack the Rar. with your AV enabled the AV can delete the ubiorbitapi_r2.dll.
So when you copy only the gu.exe and conviction_game.exe it will give you the error from above.So in conclusion when you unpack the Rar. you have to DISABLE YOUR AV...That's what happened to me and im sure that's what happened to all the other who had this error.

for those playing ac2 and scc both
here is how i got mine assassins creed 2 and splinter cell conviction to work simultaneously on skidrow crack
before installing scc ,copy crack's dll files
or have a copy of ur previous skidrow ac2 crack dll files then switch ur dll files for playing respective game 
i.e. if u wanna play scc copy its dll files to ubisoft launcher and when over copy it to another location to save it and after that if u want to play ac2 copy its dll files to ubisoft launcher and replace scc's one and play it and after over save it dll files and keep on switching dll files for playing both games simultaneously.  
if u r using avg switch ur resistance shield disable 
or 
go to tools>advance settings>resistance shield>excluded files>add path of dll directories
and if u have ati cards upgrade catalyst to 10.4a for graphics issues
hope all this information works 4 u as it did 4 me

I would like to futher add comment to those that had the same talking/sound issue I had (with realtek hd audio).

I fixed this earlier today it took me quite some time but what i basically did was disconnect all the speakers and cables and cleaaned the jacks (don't overlook simple things like this!)

I then uninstalled all audio/realtek associated program % drivers then downloaded the latest ones which can be found easily on google (mine was actually from gigabyte)

having installed the latest drivers/reboot i then  proceeded to launch the realtak audio manager and THEN connect all my speakers etc back to the pc associating the speakers witht he correct jack i.e centre/front/rear.

made sure that I set my option to 5.1 and THEN enabled 'speaker fill' and 'bass  management'. then i went to the sound effects tab and picked one which sounded ok (for me generic).

the next step was to go to the room correction tab where you can increase the individual volume levels for each speakers, in this circumstance i only increases the 'rear' speakers volume.

Now once all that is set when i tested my sound I WAS getting sound from all speakers, therefore i loaded the game and then went into audio settings, changing it to 5.1 from 2.1 (default) and again tested it.. and this time I WAS able to hear sound in each speaker.. 

Now the last thing was I lowered the ingame 'background/music/etc' so that the speaking would not be 'overpowered' by the rest of the game noise..

Hey presto!! I got sound and am fucking loving this game thus far!!

Hope i helped you guys with this problem feel free to copy&paste this everywhere so we can all enjoy this game!

To solve the black start up crash:

GO TO C:/PROGRAM DATA/UBISOFT/CONVICTION THERE SHOULD BE A FILE IN THERE CALLED "CONVICTION USER PC", open in notepad. PS: PROGRAM DATA is a hidden folder.

Locate the lines:
FullscreenViewportX=1440
FullscreenViewportY=900
WindowedViewportX=1440
WindowedViewportY=900

Change the values with your desired resolution parameters. Lauch the game.

Credits = Andy71480 in steam foruns for this fix.

This works perfectly.
The game is great, and you can also play through LAN (or with any friend through programs like Hamachi) so it's even better!

To people having problems/crashes at launch, try this:
Completely uninstall SC and Ubisoft Game Launcher and then reinstall both in the default installation folder. Restart your pc. Double click conviction_game.exe.
Worked for me. :)

GUYS! I found out how to fix this problem, where the screen turns into black then after 2-3 seconds it crashes to desktop! If it worked comment =)

OK, follow these steps:

Go to ur root //C Drive//
Then go to //ProgramData//
Then go to //Ubisoft//
Then go to //Conviction//
Then open the //ConvictionUserPC.ini// file
Scroll down to //[UserVideoOptions.SKIDROW]// if using SKIDROW SCC SKIDROW.iso
Under that title you find //FullscreenViewportX=800// and //FullscreenViewportY=600//
Change this screen reselution to your screen format.

HERE I WILL SHOW YOU HOW IT LOOKS LIKE:

[UserVideoOptions.SKIDROW]
VisualQuality=3
StartupFullscreen=True
FullscreenViewportX=1680
FullscreenViewportY=1050
MaxRefreshRate=60
WindowedViewportX=1260
WindowedViewportY=708
UseVSync=False
UseHDR=False
MonitorAspect=1.600000
ShadowQuality=1
TextureQuality=2
EnvDetail=0
RealtimeReflections=False
MaxAnisotropy=2
DynamicAmbientOcclusion=0
MultiSampleType=2
CullDistance=0
TransparentDOF=True

NOTICE! 

//FullscreenViewportX=1680//
//FullscreenViewportY=1050//
THIS IS WHAT I CHANGED MINE TO...

I really hope this works out for you, if any question just contact me :)
